objects.text:
Natural Waistline Design
Five Functional Pockets
Contoured Hips for Comfort
Premium Cotton Blend Fabric

product_details.description: Gloria Vanderbilt's # 1 selling women's jean in America with over 60 million sold nationwide the Amanda Classic High Rise Tapered Jean. This pant sits at your natural waistline with five fully functional pockets, easy front zipper fly, standard size belt loops for your favorite belt and contoured hips for that comfort fit you've come to love. Pairs great with all tops from fashionable to your basic tee shirt and all footwear from stylish heels and trendy boot to your favorite flats! The Amanda high rise Jean gives you the mid section confidence you want and versatility you need in any wardrobe, perfect to wear to work, attending a class or spending time with friends for family. Available in various colors, prints, embroidery and embellishments. Effortlessly fun and stylish. A versatile yet classic look that attracts and connects with the modern sensibility of consumers of all ages. STYLE - high rise jean sits at natural waist with functional pockets, easy zipper fly, belt loops and slight taper leg for the fit you love VERSATILITY - Goes great with all tops from fashionable to basic a T-shirts and all footwear from stylish boots to your favorit shoes. LENGTH - This pant comes in a 31 inch regular/average inseam, 29 inch short inseam and 33 inch long inseam with a 15 inch leg opening. BRAND - Effortlessly fun and stylish Gloria Vanderbilt is a versatile yet classic look that attracts and connects with the modern sensibility of consumers of all ages. Fabric type - 73% Cotton, 25% Polyester, 2% Spandex ** Care instructions - Machine Wash ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper **

banner_details:
This banner design promotes a pair of jeans with a clean and modern aesthetic. The layout is framed with double-lined and curved-edge rectangular borders that add depth and sophistication. A text element labeled "heading" is prominently placed at the top in bold serif font, followed by a smaller uppercase subheading ("subheading") that introduces product features. The body of the banner includes a list of features in the "description" text block, aligned to the left. A large, clear image of a person modeling the jeans ("product_image") balances the layout on the right. At the bottom left, a large price tag ("price") stands out, alongside a rectangular call-to-action button ("cta_button") containing the text "SHOP NOW" ("cta"). The overall style uses a balanced mix of bold and simple typography, creating a visually appealing and informative design.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Navy Blue: #1E3A6C
- Steel Blue: #2D5698
- Cool Gray: #F5F7FA
- Charcoal: #333333
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a pair of classic blue jeans styled with a white top and black ballet flats, creating a clean and timeless color palette ideal for an advertisement banner. The denim displays rich hues of medium to dark blue, subtly highlighted with faded accents at the thighs and knees, creating depth and texture without harsh contrasts. The seamless blending of these tones enhances visual interest while maintaining a cohesive look. Key colors include Deep Indigo (#264778), Classic Denim Blue (#3465A4), Faded Light Blue (#6B90C3), Crisp White (#FFFFFF), and Matte Black (#1E1E1E). This harmonious palette conveys style, simplicity, and versatility.
